resources.string: Hey Checkout \'Chromer\' for quick and secure browsing experience! Download here https://goo.gl/992ils
Compatible custom tab provider not found

Chromer requires you to have any Custom tab compatible browser on your phone. Currently there are no browsers on your phone that supports it. Would you like to install Google Chrome (Free) from play store? If you already have it, then please update it to latest version.

You can view this again in the about screen.

1.3
  • DONATE option. Please donate if you like this app and to support development:)
  • Share links to open in Chromer
  • For 6.0, select a text link to open in Chromer
  • Option to choose between multiple Chrome versions
  • About screen
  • Link to Chromer G+ community
  • Changelog screen
  • Link to Chrome in case no custom tab provider is found


1.2.1
  • Reworked share menu. Direct share enabled for 6.0


1.2
  • Change Toolbar color to your liking
  • Configure animations
  • Link to read about chrome custom tabs
  • Option to share Chromer link to others
  • Licenses dialog
  • Tutorial flow performance fixes
  • Icons and imagery updated


1.1
  • Much requested copy and share options


1.0
  • Fixed "no custom tab compatible browser found" issue.
Could not open custom tab, falling back to normal browsers
Not a supported link, try again
